entry.title: Awesome Ffmpeg Updates on Aug 13 - Aug 19, 2018
entry.content:
Docs

  • Filters - Docs for FFmpeg's powerful filter chains (scaling, cropping, concatenating, merging, etc.). This is one of my most visited links when working with FFmpeg.
  • Man page - Official FFmpeg man page.
  • CLI flags (‚≠ê50) - A comprehensive list of all FFmpeg commandline flags. Really useful for searching random flags that you come across in the wild.

JavaScript

  • ffmpeg-concat (‚≠ê946) - Concats a list of videos together using FFmpeg with sexy OpenGL transitions.
  • ffmpeg-extract-frames (‚≠ê64) - Extracts screenshots from a video using FFmpeg.
  • ffmpeg.js (‚≠ê3.4k) - Port of FFmpeg to JavaScript via Emscripten. Allows for limited FFmpeg use on the client-side.
  • ffmpeg-static (‚≠ê1.2k) - Provides static FFmpeg binaries for macOS, Linux, and Windows. Very useful for CI testing.
  • tangerine - Webcam streaming service using Node.js, FFmpeg, WebSockets, and Lad.

Community

  • Stack Overflow
  • Mailing Lists
  • IRC
entry.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Aug 13 - Aug 19, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Ffmpeg Updates on Apr 02 - Apr 08, 2018
entry.content:
JavaScript

  • fluent-ffmpeg (‚≠ê8.2k) - A fluent API to FFmpeg. If you only use one tool from this list, it should be this one.
  • ffmpeg-probe (‚≠ê15) - Wrapper around ffprobe for getting info about media files.
  • ffmpeg-generate-video-preview (‚≠ê155) - Generates an attractive image strip or GIF preview from a video.
  • ffmpeg-extract-frame (‚≠ê16) - Extracts a single frame from a video.
  • ffmpeg-extract-audio (‚≠ê18) - Extracts an audio stream from a media file.
  • ffmpeg-on-progress (‚≠ê14) - Utility for robustly reporting progress with fluent-ffmpeg.

Mobile

  • simplest ffmpeg mobile (‚≠ê1.9k) - FFmpeg examples for Android and iOS.

Tutorials

  • Learn FFmpeg libav the Hard Way (‚≠ê10k)
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Apr 02 - Apr 08, 2018
